entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
